name: The Spark of One
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Space- Attract

M- Mute

To explain the game I leave you this poem:

A world of despair
There is something wrong
This world isn't fair
Something can be done
We must stay strong
Things can change
Because all it takes...
Is THE SPARK OF ONE

UPDATE : With this new build I suggjest trying windows64 for a better experience
